column6: We couldn't match that statement. Please refresh your statements and try again.
column7: 1) Refresh statements from ERP;2) Verify statement ID exists and is open;3) If recent, wait 5â€“10 mins and retry;4) If mismatch persists, create support ticket with account+stmt id

column6: This account isn't eligible for online payments right now.
column7: 1) Check account status/credit hold;2) Verify billing account mapping;3) If on hold, follow AR policy;4) Inform customer of next steps

column6: The payment network took too long to respond. We'll try again shortly.
column7: 1) Check gateway status page;2) Auto-retry after 60s;3) If 3+ failures in 15 mins, stop and notify;4) Offer alternate method (ACH/CC)

column6: Your card seems expired. Please update your card details and try again.
column7: 1) Prompt user to update card expiry;2) Re-tokenize method;3) Retry charge;4) If still failing, suggest alternate method

column6: The bank declined the charge due to insufficient funds. Try another card or payment method.
column7: 1) Ask user to use another card;2) Suggest ACH/wire;3) If recurring, schedule a reminder;4) Log outcome

column6: The issuing bank declined this payment. Please try another card or contact your bank.
column7: 1) Advise customer to contact bank;2) Offer alternate method;3) If repeated, flag account for review

column6: Looks like this payment was already processed. Showing the existing receipt.
column7: 1) Search last 24h for matching txn;2) Display existing receipt;3) Prevent double-charge;4) Close as resolved

column6: Your billing address didn't match the card on file. Please confirm and try again.
column7: 1) Prompt for correct billing address;2) Retry;3) If persists, suggest alternate method

column6: The security code didn't match. Re-enter it carefully and try again.
column7: 1) Prompt user to re-enter CVV;2) Retry;3) If persists, suggest alternate method

column6: Additional verification is required by your bank to complete this payment.
column7: 1) Initiate 3DS flow;2) If unavailable, offer alternate method;3) If repeated failures, advise bank contact

column6: Our payment partner is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
column7: 1) Check status;2) Disable auto-retries;3) Notify incident channel;4) Surface ETA to user

column6: This payment exceeds allowed limits. Try a smaller amount or use another method.
column7: 1) Check limit policy;2) Allow split payments if permitted;3) Suggest ACH/wire;4) Escalate if policy exception requested

column6: The saved payment method couldn't be used. Please re-add it and try again.
column7: 1) Invalidate local token;2) Prompt user to re-add;3) Re-tokenize;4) Retry

column6: This account is temporarily on hold. Please contact support to resolve billing status.
column7: 1) Verify AR status;2) Provide support contact;3) Do not charge;4) Document call outcome

column6: This account isn't eligible for AutoPay yet.
column7: 1) Check age/NSF policy;2) Display criteria;3) Offer one-time payment;4) Notify AR if edge case

column6: Something wasn't right in the request. Please review details and try again.
column7: 1) Validate request payload;2) Fix client-side validation;3) Retry;4) Add guardrails for future

column6: Network hiccup. We'll try that again in a moment.
column7: 1) Auto-retry with backoff;2) Monitor error rate;3) Offer alternate method if persistent
